definition: that being the case/then/in that case
(conjunction used to express contrast with a previous clause) but/then/standard/norm/principle/to imitate/to follow/classifier for written items

sentences.english: But I look so stupid with this big zit on my nose.
sentences.chinese: 然则我鼻子上长这个大芳华痘看起来好蠢啊。

sentences.english: But the architects did not even have the brains to choose the second.
sentences.chinese: 然则欧盟的设计师连选择第二套方案的智商也没有。

sentences.english: But the substance of morphology, each in turn choose in what should also.
sentences.chinese: 然则物之形貌，每决于何择于转折也。

sentences.english: In one room, I found a rusty bronze music box that plays the National anthem.
sentences.chinese: 我再房间里发现一个沾满铜锈然则能唱国歌的音乐盒。

sentences.english: DINK families refer to families that have dual income and no kids.
sentences.chinese: 丁克家庭是指有双份工资然则没有孩子的家庭。

sentences.english: Galvatron is defeated, but something begins to repair his mind.
sentences.chinese: 惊破天战败，然则某种神秘力量开始修复他受损意识。

sentences.english: But remember both keys are played together to give sweet music.
sentences.chinese: 然则，要记着只要诟谇键的合奏能力弹出美好的音乐。

sentences.english: But luckily the son but ambiguity.
Then, what is to be done?
But does the voice of purple Yi spread at this time.
sentences.chinese: 然则这时紫怡的声音传来。

sentences.english: Yet in these times he might have done much worse.
sentences.chinese: 然则时至今日，也许更不像样。

sentences.english: Oslash; Galvatron is defeated, but something begins to repair his mind.
sentences.chinese: 惊破天战败，然则某种神秘力量开始修复他受损意识。

sentences.english: However, the panda has won million of fans in China.
sentences.chinese: 然则，这只熊猫在中国拥罕见百万粉丝。

sentences.english: Yet in the space near the window, she heard and saw something plunging to and fro.
sentences.chinese: 然则窗边的空隙上，她闻声有东西在来回坚定。

sentences.english: Although my deskmate defect, but I think he is a good partner.
sentences.chinese: 虽然我的同桌出缺陷，然则我认为他是个好同桌。

sentences.english: Christof: He was born in front of a live audience.
sentences.chinese: 然则他就出身在直播现场。

definition: old variant of 愷|恺[kai3]/old variant of 凱|凯[kai3]
classical final particle, similar to modern 了[le5]
minister not afraid to give forthright criticism
lit. the mountains crumble and the trees lie ruined/a great sage has died (idiom)
